mapper.insert: insert ignore into successKilled (seckill_id, user_phone) values (#{seckillId, userPhone});
mapper.select: select sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.state, s.seckill_id as "seckill.seckill_id", s.name as "seckill.name", s.number as "seckill_number", s.start_time as "seckill_startTime", s.end_time as "seckill_endTime", s.create_time as "seckill_createTime" from success_killed sk inner join seckill s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id
